title: Nami's Hand Stab Foreshadows Her Navigator Skills
theoryText: The moment where Nami stabs her own hand behind Usopp's back demonstrates incredible precision and control - the same precision she uses as a navigator and cartographer. This scene subtly establishes that Nami has exceptional fine motor skills and spatial awareness, which becomes crucial to her role as the Straw Hats' navigator.
author: Unknown

title: Hatchan's Kindness Sets Up His Redemption Arc
theoryText: Hatchan unknowingly helping Zoro escape isn't just comedy - it's foreshadowing his eventual redemption. Unlike the other Arlong Pirates officers who are ruthless and cruel, Hatchan shows a genuinely friendly nature even toward strangers. This moment plants the seed for his later transformation from antagonist to ally of the Straw Hats.
author: Unknown
